HomePage.title: Space AI Cryptocurrency – Earning Profit in the Crypto-Financial Market Segment
HomePage.text1: Cryptocurrency is confidently spreading around the world! More than 500 million people worldwide are involved in crypto. Some buy, some sell. Many try to earn money on crypto exchanges, but usually lose it. Do you know why?
HomePage.text2: Staking, inclusive blockchains, Sybil attack, Wyckoff, wash trading... Complicated? Yes! And even harder — to win without understanding these terms.
HomePage.text3: Artificial intelligence beats world champions in chess and Go — it predicts the future. And now this intelligence is working for
HomePage.text4: It independently invests in cryptocurrencies, NFTs, and GameFi. It buys, sells, analyzes — without emotions or mistakes, under expert supervision.
HomePage.text5: The most expensive NFT image was sold for $150 million! Half the world is in gaming hubs. Space AI’s AI invests in these niches and earns insane returns.
HomePage.text6: Space AI earns huge daily returns when its AI invests in these business directions. Unlike humans, AI knows exactly when to buy, sell, stake, or withdraw. It predicts, anticipates, and invests — all under the guidance of the experienced Space AI team. And we, the investors, receive on average 1% of the company's investment gains per day — and even more!!
HomePage.text7: Investors receive on average 1% daily profit. And that’s not the limit.

AboutPage.title: About Us
AboutPage.heroDescription: Learn more about Space AI and how we use artificial intelligence to create financial opportunities.
AboutPage.companyParagraph1: Space AI Investments Limited, the parent company of Space AI Platform, is an innovative joint venture specializing in high-tech fields such as crypto assets, artificial intelligence, and precision manufacturing. Space AI is headquartered in Colorado, USA.
AboutPage.companyParagraph2: The company focuses on developing and providing cryptocurrency trading services powered by advanced AI technologies. Its goal is to help users earn through innovative IT solutions.
AboutPage.howTitle: How does Space AI make money?
AboutPage.howList1: AI trading operations: profits are shared between the user, the company, and the buffer fund.
AboutPage.howList4: The buffer fund covers user losses.
AboutPage.refList1: 6% referral bonus from team members' investments.
AboutPage.refList2: Daily team income: 20–1% depending on level.
AboutPage.refList3: Weekly and monthly bonuses (up to $100 weekly and $100 monthly).
AboutPage.incomeTitle: Where does our income come from?
AboutPage.incomeDescription: When an AI-powered transaction is completed, the profit is divided into three parts. The first part is our income:
AboutPage.incomeUserProfitText: the actual investor profit from AI transactions, paid as a reward.
AboutPage.incomeReferralBonusText: 6% from team members’ investments, from the company’s capital pool.
AboutPage.incomeTeamBonusText: from 1% to 20% daily from participants' income.
AboutPage.aiLogicParagraph1: The development of artificial intelligence depends on data processing, algorithms, and computing power. The system performs quantitative trading strategies, analyzes markets, generates signals, tests them, and constantly optimizes.
AboutPage.aiLogicParagraph2: If the AI incurs losses, the company compensates them from a buffer fund. The guaranteed minimum profit is 0.5% per day.
AboutPage.socialImpactText: Mass AI adoption may lead to job loss. Profit distribution among people helps avoid social conflict and supports technology development.
AboutPage.futurePlansText: The company has an MSB license, publishes contract code, collaborates with other projects, and prepares SAT token listing. The Orange package provides a fixed income of 1.3% due to risk control, stable investments, and partnerships.
AboutPage.futureTogetherText: We are creating an innovative financial ecosystem where everyone can earn.

BusinessSection.title: Business Plan
BusinessSection.heroDescription: Discover how to earn with our referral system, staking, and team growth.
BusinessSection.boostInfo: Choosing a higher staking amount can provide a higher annual interest rate, thus encouraging users to commit to holding SAT tokens for a longer period.
BusinessSection.intro: Staking in Space AI is a powerful mechanism that allows users to utilize their SAT tokens and earn additional SAT interest.
BusinessSection.stakeText: Staking involves locking a certain amount of SAT tokens. This action represents your commitment to hold and grow your SAT assets over a period of time.
BusinessSection.unstakeText: If at any point you choose not to continue staking, you can stop early. Your SAT tokens will be returned to your account within 24 hours.
BusinessSection.rewardsText: By staking SAT tokens, you are entitled to earn SAT interest. This means you will receive additional SAT tokens as a reward for holding your assets.

section2.referrerIncome: Referrer's Income: When a user spends SAT tokens on a quantitative bet, it increases the referrer's reward.

news1.title: An investor's review of their journey and experience with the company.
news1.description: Yesterday, I achieved financial independence through this system in just 3 weeks. At first, I didn’t want to share this with anyone because people can be jealous or judgmental when someone succeeds. But now I’m telling you because it might give hope or inspire someone. I’ve been an entrepreneur for 4.5 years. I regularly invested in index and ETF funds to prepare for retirement. For a long time, I dreamed of a monthly income that could replace my salary and provide freedom. I also invested in dividend-paying companies, but they brought less than €10/month, and the interest income was only about €100. No vacations. I quickly understood how SpaceAi works, how fast it returns capital, and I moved 1/4 of my investments here. Yesterday I got my first significant return, and today the second. Even after a 10% platform fee and 30% capital tax, my income matches or exceeds my salary. I’m now financially independent. When I was about to shut down my company due to losses — this came just in time. I hope SpaceAi continues for many more years.
